item.title: Patching requests HTTP hooks with custom arguments
item.description: I am working on a project where we have lots of functions integrated with external APIs. item.title: Understanding key concepts before writing a Kernel
item.description: In this series of posts, I intend to document my re-go on writing a small, portable kernel for the RISC-V architecture. I developed a micro-kernel for the RISC-V ISA in my bachelor thesis, however, due to the time it takes on developing a kernel, and the time I had on writing a bachelor’s thesis, I choose on writing the kernel for the Sifive’s HiFive1 Rev B development board due to their well written bare metal compatibility Library for the board, low cost and most importantly, RISC-V.
